Bio1: Joe was the Supporters Player of the Year in our first League Championship winning season. Last season he managed the incredible feat of only conceding 13 League goals ... unlucky for some, maybe, but certainly not for Brora.
Bio2: Joe signed in July '13 and has been ever present between the sticks since then. Hero of penalty shoot-outs and often the man who has secured the points in important games, Sometimes in football the buck stops with the Goalie. And Joe stops.

Bio1: This is Steven's second spell at Brora Rangers and we are delighted to see him back after putting on some terrific displays for Strathspey Thistle prior to returning to Dudgeon Park last October
Bio2: Given Joe's record since joining Brora, it can't be easy

Bio1: John signed at the start of this season from Orkney side Rendall FC. Usually slotting in at Right Back, John has terrific pace and an uncanny ability to read the game for a 21 year old
Bio2: John took a nasty knock right at the start of the season, so we have been denied seeing the best of him for a few weeks ... except those who witnessed his game against us.

Bio1: Ally is another face we'd seen in red at Dudgeon Park. Always keen to get forward, fans have been delighted to see Ally sign a new contract
Bio2: Having returned from the US, Ally put pen to paper again for Brora in August.

Bio1: Colin joined us at the start of 2014 and quickly established himself as a fearless member of the back four. A broken collarbone saw Colin miss much of the end of our second League Championship, but a full recovery sees him as an ever present member of the starting 11.
Bio2: Colin arrived in January 2014 ... and has lived up to the reputation he built for himself at Clachnacuddin. Quick to snuff out threats from the opposition and just as quick to snatch the opportunity to score some vital goals throughout last season.

Bio1: Grant's experience over the past 2 seasons was invaluable in the success of Brora Rangers.
